General.Name: RoboTechnik Intelligent Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: RoboTechnik Intelligent Technology Co., LTD engages in designing, developing, manufacturing, and selling smart manufactory automated equipment in China. The company offers manufacturing execution systems; cell production systems; semiconductors; and automotive camera module and motor assembly and test lines. The company also provides smart factory solutions for wafer production, cell manufacturing, photonics and laser, and systems and services. In addition, it offers solar wafer smart factory design, solar cell smart factory design, equipment upgrade, and spare parts sales services. The company provides its solutions for photovoltaic cells, electronics and semiconductors, automotive precision parts, food and pharmaceuticals and other fields. RoboTechnik Intelligent Technology Co., LTD was founded in 2011 is based in Suzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 3, Suzhou Industrial Park, Suzhou, China

5.Name: Mr. Wang  Hongjun
5.Title: Director, Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
